data.text: One of the best rooms I've ever stayed in. Two floors room where kids had a blast. The management was excellent hosts where Ozan at the front desk made everything smooth and catered to all our needs. This hotel is in an industrial area but if you have your own car it takes only 10 minutes to teach the city. Positively you're saved from the hustle bustle and the traffic. However the rooms the management the price makes up for the location . I would rate it one of the highest in my stays all over the world! Thank Ozan thanks Ramada keep it up üëç
data.title: Excellent two floor room queen suites

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for this valuable comment you shared on Trip Advisor and for your praising words about our hotel. These nice comments we receive from you, our valued guests, are the biggest motivation for our team.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel as soon as possible.

Kind regards,

Ozan Ozturk

Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Ozan Ozturk

data.text:
Extremely helpful friendly Staff.
The Manager Mr. Ozan is a Professional in his Hospitality environment,I highly recommend this Hotel for Business trips.
Food is good
House keeping is good
Air conditioning in the room is good
Everything is good :)
data.title: Good experience everyday.

data.text: I've  been here 2 times in 2022 and 2023. It was always a really good experience! The rooms are very comfortable. Cleaning service is perfect. Laundry service is excellent; clothes were given back perfectly clean. I would like to thank the entire restaurant team. Really helpful and friendly staff. Some gluten free available for celiac people.
data.title: Good Experience

data.text:
This hotel has been a beautiful experience.
You will have accesso to a pool, sauna and Gym...
About the food the dishes are so tasty, with a large menu and the waiters are so available.
The rooms are beautiful with a very comfortable bed.
You can even order food in your room if you desire.
Very nice.
data.title: Very good hotel

data.text: Very good rooms,eats and services. I like the personal, always ready for help. I like the option of smoking rooms but i miss that my window could open. At night i can sleep really well because i cannot hwar any noise.
data.title: Ramada hotel experience
